title: API Utilization and Documentation Comprehension Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of software development concepts and experience with web/mobile services
context.additional_context: Consideration of Learning Convenience in Smartphone Environments, Structured Around Practical, Applicable Case Studies

learning_goals: Learners can identify the core components of API documentation (conceptual model, usage patterns, execution mechanisms) with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze API error cases in real-world scenarios and propose at least three appropriate solutions
Learners can create and explain a simple integrated system design diagram based on provided API documentation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
